title: Silver Mid Main LFT
body:
so yeah ive been bouncing around silver for season 4 but i think i have potential to go slightly higher with a bit more practise or a team that i can work and practise with to get better.

my main champs are {{champion:1}} {{champion:45}} {{champion:38}} {{champion:127}}  but ill play just about anyone depending on my mood (except{{champion:157}} {{champion:238}}  i dont like them and probably wont ever)

if anyone can make use of me or just wants to give me a shot, add me in game
